{%trans "Getting started"%}

{%trans "Sarshomars API exposes the entire Sarshomar infrastructure via a standardized programmatic interface. Using Sarshomars API, you can do just about anything you can do on Sarshomar.com."%}

{%trans "The Sarshomar API is a RESTful API based on HTTPS requests and JSON responses. If you are registered with Sarshomar, you can obtain your API key from My Account page, found here: "%} {%trans "Go to My account."%}

{%trans "Endpoints"%}

{%trans "The API is accessed by making HTTPS requests to a specific version endpoint URL, in which GET, POST, PUT and DELETE methods dictate how your interact with the information available. Every endpoint is accessed only via the SSL-enabled HTTPS (port 443) protocol."%}

{%trans "Everything (methods, parameters, etc.) is fixed to a version number, and every call must contain one. The latest version is Version 1."%}

{%trans "The stable HTTPS endpoint for the latest version is:"%}

{{url.base}}/api/v1/

{%trans "HTTP response codes"%}

{%trans "The status of a response can be determined from the HTTP status code."%}

{%trans "Code"%} {%trans "Status"%} {%trans "Description"%}
200 OK {%trans "request successful"%}
304 Not Modified
400 Bad Request {%trans "request was invalid"%}
401 Unauthorized {%trans "user does not have permission"%}
403 Forbidden {%trans "request not authenticated"%}
429 Too many requests {%trans "client is rate limited"%}
405 Method Not Allowed {%trans "incorrect HTTP method provided"%}
415 Unsupported Media Type {%trans "response is not valid JSON"%}

POSTثبت نظر سنجی☺

لورم ایپسوم متن ساختگی با تولید سادگی نامفهوم از صنعت چاپ و با استفاده X-Auth-User-Service-Key از طراحان گرافیک است. چاپگرها و متون بلکه روزنامه و مجله در ستون و سطرآنچنان که لازم است و برای شرایط فعلی تکنولوژی مورد نیاز و کاربردهای متنوع با هدف بهبود X-Auth-User-Service-Key ابزارهای کاربردی می باشد.


post/poll

شناسه
متغیر توضیحات
اولویت مثال
first_name
string User's first name
اجباری "John"
last_name
string User's last name
اختیاری "Appleseed"
telephone
int User's telephone number
مشروط "+98 123-123-1234"

GET / HTTP/1.1[CRLF] Host: sarshomar.com[CRLF] Connection: close[CRLF] User-Agent: Web-sniffer/1.1.0 (+http://web-sniffer.net/)[CRLF] Accept-Encoding: gzip[CRLF] Accept-Charset: ISO-8859-1,UTF-8;q=0.7,*;q=0.7[CRLF] Cache-Control: no-cache[CRLF] Accept-Language: de,en;q=0.7,en-us;q=0.3[CRLF] Referer: http://web-sniffer.net/[CRLF]

cURL

curl -X PATCH "https://api.Sarshomar.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/settings/always_online" \ -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \ -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \ -H "Content-Type: application/json" \ --data '{"value":"on"}'
